publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2132# Ms Sandra White: Threatened Closure of Kelvin Hall International Sports Arena—That the Parliament notes with great concern the proposal to sell off the Kelvin Hall International Sports Arena in Glasgow; recognises that the Kelvin Hall is a much loved and vital public sports facility and that its closure would lead to a serious decline in the provision of sports facilities for local people, and therefore believes that the Scottish Executive should make urgent representations to Glasgow City Council to prevent the closure of the Kelvin Hall.
